mapper.select: SELECT MNU_NO as KEY, MNU_NM as TITLE, MNU_PARENT as PARENT FROM COM_MENU WHERE DELETEFLAG='N' ORDER BY MNU_NO

SELECT MNU_NO as mnuNo, MNU_PARENT as mnuParent, MNU_TYPE as mnuType, MNU_NM as mnuNm, MNU_MSG_CD as mnuMsgCd, MNU_DESC as mnuDesc, MNU_TARGET as mnuTarget, MNU_FILENM as mnuFilenm, MNU_IMGPATH as mnuImgpath, MNU_CUSTOM as mnuCustom, MNU_DESKTOP as mnuDesktop, MNU_MOBILE as mnuMobile, MNU_ORDER as mnuOrder, MNU_CERT_TYPE as mnuCertType, MNU_EXTN_CONN_YN as mnuExtnConnYn, MNU_START_HOUR as mnuStartHour, MNU_END_HOUR as mnuEndHour, REGUSERNO as reguserno, CHGUSERNO as chguserno, DELETEFLAG as deleteflag FROM COM_MENU WHERE DELETEFLAG = 'N' AND MNU_NO = #{mnuNo}
